analysis.description:
BullsAndCows.withdrawal (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(sum) (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol)
CommUtils.nameFilter (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#248-317) is declared view but contains assembly code
bCount in RoomInfo.tryAnswer (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#573-574) is a local variable never initialiazed
aCount in RoomInfo.tryAnswer (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#572-573) is a local variable never initialiazed

RoomInfo.sendReplayDividend (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#656-671) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ps.deposit(rp.ownerIds[j],oneD) (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#668-669)

RoomInfo.buyReply (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#705-735) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ps.deposit(d.replys.seller[ansHash],lessFee) (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#732-734)

BullsAndCows.award (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#1063-1098) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-players.depositAuthor(nextRound) (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#1096-1097)
Parameter '_name' of Player.registerName (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#48) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_name' of Player.isEmptyName (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#55) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_name' of Player.getByName (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#59) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_input' of CommUtils.nameFilter (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#248) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_t' of RoomInfo.tryAnswer (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#568-569) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'increaseRate_1000' of RoomInfo.init (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#590) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_roomName' of BullsAndCows.getRoomIdxByNameElseLargest (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#949-950) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_n' of BullsAndCows.isEmptyName (/unique_contracts/0x31c6f7ede8f4da421240894bfe9519ff00fc7c59.sol#1055-1056) is not in mixedCase
